entry.title: Nootro-Focus
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Nue Co.
Type: Supplement
Price: 85.00

A cognitive supplement designed to heighten mental clarity + sharpen your focus. Nootro-Focus uses natural nootropics and patented ingredient technology to support your brain health now, and in the future.

Cognitive supplements fall into two camps: they’re either instant effect with no long-lasting impact, or have no immediate results and little reassurance that your mind is improving over time. The ingredients in Nootro-Focus are clinically proven to increase neurotransmitter activity and fuel the brain, while improving memory, attention + focus*.

Short term, Nootro-Focus works to reduce restlessness and sharpen mental clarity, increasing Alpha brain waves, helping you zone in on the task in front of you*. Within six weeks, the ingredients in the formula have been clinically proven to increase the production of crucial “brain fuel” ATP (adenosine triphosphate) by 13.6%, and increase the formation of brain cell membranes by 26%*.

Clinical studies show that memory + recall is improved within six weeks, while nerve growth factor (NGF), which aids neurogenesis and protects the brain, is sustained in the long-term*.

• 60 capsules per container = one month supply

• 100% caffeine-free and designed for daily use.

• Free from fillers, bulking agents, flavorings, colorings and sweeteners. Non-GMO. Gluten-Free. Dairy-Free. Vegan. Caffeine-Free. Soy-Free.

• *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Lion's Mane Mushroom (organic) 500mg, Citicoline (Cognizin) 250mg, Bacopa Monniere Leaf Extract 225mg, L-Theanine (Suntheanine) 100mg, Ginkgo Bilobaleaf Extract 60mg, Rhodiola Rosearoot Extract 50mg. Other Ingredients: hypromellose, organic rice extract, organic rice hulls, organic gum arabic, organic sunflower oil.

Directions

Please consult with your doctor prior to using this product. The Nue Co. recommends taking two capsules every morning with breakfast.

Cocoa Kiss: A rich, chocolate brownie fortified with marine collagen and crunchy cacao nibs.

Please consult with your physician before using this product.

For best results, Kalumi recommends a daily dose of Kalumi BEAUTYfood. Their exclusive protein-packed formula has a full serving of hydrolyzed marine collagen, slow-releasing carbs (sweet potatoes) and healthy fats (cocoa butter, nuts), which means you’ll stay satiated longer.

entry.title: Bincho Teapot
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sort of Coal
Type: teapot
Price: 125.00

Sort of Coal's heat-resistant glass teapot features a beautifully minimalist aesthetic with two sticks of Kishu Binchotan.

The water used to brew tea has a real effect on its taste. White Charcoal naturally purifies water by adsorbing chlorine and adding minerals to it; softening its taste and turning it into mineral water. In collaboration with MATIAS MOELLENBACH, Sort of Coal has combined the ancient Japanese tradition of Kishu Binchotan with various elements of contemporary Danish design. 650 ml.

Ingredients

Binchotan: Activated White Charcoal

Directions

Start by rinsing the Binchotan under cold tap water. In order to sterilize the Binchotan, it needs to be boiled before use. Place the binchotan in a pot of water and let it rise to a boil for 5 minutes. Turn off the heat, drain the water and let the Binchotan cool in the pot. The teapot is dishwasher safe.

entry.title: Sleep Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Nue Co.
Type: Travel Kit
Price: 70.00

Magnesium Ease and Sleep Drops work together to calm the body + mind, delivering a restful sleep. Drift off naturally, with no next day effects.

Sleep Drops

Valerian root + passionflower induce a sense of tranquility, while catnip + chamomile work together to calm your central nervous system, even at 30,000 feet. Alcohol-free + non habit-forming, this formula will help you fall asleep and stay asleep, without any residual drowsy feelings the next day.

Magnesium Ease

Recent studies have shown that up to 80% of Americans are deficient in magnesium. This essential mineral is vital for over 325 biochemical reactions in the body and lack of it has been shown to negatively impact sleep quality, muscle, nerve + heart function. Magnesium sprays like The Nue Co.'s are five times more effective than taking a traditional supplement. They pair high quality magnesium chloride with lavender and arnica oil, which contains helanalin — a potent anti-inflammatory. Together the three ingredients efficiently aid relaxation + reduce muscle tension. Don't be surprised if you feel a slight tingling sensation after your first application—it's totally normal and a good sign that it's working!

• Natural + Organic Ingredients

• Made in the UK

• The Nue Co. does not dilute their products with anything, which includes natural thickeners or flavorings.

- *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Magnesium Ease: Water, Magnesium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate/Sebacate*, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate/Caprate*, Lavender Oil, Arnica Oil, Dehydroacetic acid, Benzyl alcohol.

Sleep Drops: Purified water, glycerine, Valerian root tincture, catnip tincture, german chamomile flower tincture, passionflower tincture, citric acid*, potassium sorbate*.

Directions

Take up to 30 minutes before bedtime to ease tension and help with relaxation. Place the Sleep Drops directly under the tongue for absorption. Then 3 sprays of Magnesium Ease delivers 45mg of magnesium. 6-12 drops of Sleep Drops under the tongue and 3 sprays of Magnesium Ease on aching muscles before bed.

entry.title: Travel Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Biocol Labs
Type: Herbal Supplement
Price: 75.00

Plant-based remedies kit for the modern traveler.

No matter how far you travel or how many places you go, this kit will provide a sense of calm, relief and wellbeing during your journey. Designed to fix the five most recurrent imbalances of the frequent traveler: jet lag, flight distress, poor digestion, weakened immune system and the occasional cheeky hangover. Formulated using only botanical extracts, minerals and vitamins of superlative quality. See you on the road, wanderer.

THIS KIT CONTAINS:

• something® for dreaming (1 spray x 30ml)

• something® for a mini-rehab (10 capsules)

• something® for bloated tums (10 tablets)

• something® for immunity (2 shots x 15ml)

• These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

{Something For a Mini Rehab}: milk thistle extract, artichoke extract, dandelion extract, black radish extract, boldo extract, rosemary extract, zinc gluconate, choline Bitartrate, fumitory extract, manganese gluconate, Inositol, hydroxypropyl methylcellulose, titanium dioxide, sílica, magnesium stearate, maltodextrin.

{Something For Dreaming}: passiflora extract, lemon balm extract, lemon essential oil, vitamin b6, vitamin b1, melatonin, potassium sorbate, citric acid, polysorbate 80, sorbitol.

{Something For Immunity}: echinacea extract, propolis extract, shiitake extract, acerola extract, copper (cupric sulfate), selenium (sodium selenite), demineralized water, potassium sorbate, citric acid, glycerin, sorbitol.

{Something For Bloated Tums}: acacia fiber gum, fructooligosaccharides, pineapple extract (ananas comosus l.), papaya extract (carica papaya l.), charcoal, ginger extract (zingiber officinale roscoe), green anise extract (pimpinella anisum L.), fennel extract (foeniculum vulgare), lactobacillus acidophilus microencapsulated, lactobacillus rhamnosus microencapsulated, bifidobacterium longum microencapsulated.

Directions

Please consult your physician or other health care professional before using this product.

entry.title: Planted - Plant-Based Protein
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vitalfit
Type: Supplement
Price: 45.00

VitalFit Planted is a carefully assembled plant-protein made from organic cold-pressed pumpkin seeds and designed to help you move from workday to workout sans stomach aches, bloating, and all things artificial.

- 24 grams of plant-based protein per serving.

- Easy to digest, easy on the stomach & allergen-free.

- Eight essential vitamins & minerals missing from most diets.

- A full serving of branch-chained amino acids (BCAAs).

The most complete, most digestible plant protein on the planet.

VitalFit Planted combines the nutritional properties of organic pumpkin seeds with eight essential ingredients, branch-chained amino acids & digestive enzymes into a complete plant protein. Carefully paired natural ingredients help energize, alkalize, detoxify and fight inflammation throughout your body; all while delivering high-quality protein.*

Easy on the stomach as it is to drink.

Other plant proteins combine multiple sources of protein (hemp, soy, pea, etc), making them difficult for our bodies to digest. Vitalfit uses just one source, hydraulically-pressed, organic pumpkin seeds. This all-natural, single-source formula is gluten, grain, sugar, soy, wheat, and dairy free.*

The result is an easily digestible, hypoallergenic formula-bloating need not apply.*

• Gluten, grain, sugar, soy, wheat, dairy & GMO-free

• A raw, vegan, paleo, non-GMO & organic product made in the USA

• *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Organic Cold-Pressed Pumpkin Seeds, Organic Xylitol (natural sugar alternative), Natural Vanilla Flavors, Guar Gum (natural legume), Stevia Extract.

Directions

Vitalfit suggests mixing or blending one serving (42g) with 8-12 oz water, almond milk (with a little ice), coffee, yogurt, or favorite smoothie.

entry.title: Red Root - Energizing Endurance
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vitalfit
Type: Herbal Supplement
Price: 40.00

Energizing Endurance From Red-Violet Beets & Raw Red Spinach

Redroot is an oxygenating, pre-training blend to help prime your body for the workout ahead. Red-violet beets are combined with raw red spinach to deliver stamina-boosting nitrates that keep your muscles feeling fresh and carry you through every circuit, interval, and rep thrown your way.*

RedRoot is made of two plant-based ingredients shown to:

- Improve cardio endurance.*

- Fight muscle fatigue.*

- Increase energy.*

- Enhance athletic performance.*

- Protect your heart.*

Vitalfit's Plant-Based Take On "Pre-Workout"

Sans sketchy ingredients, tingly sensations, and a jittery crash. The natural nitrates in RedRoot are the key to letting your inner athlete shine. Your body converts these nitrates to nitric oxide, improving blood flow, reducing lactic acid, and transporting oxygen to your muscles. The endurance-building, fatigue-fighting effect allows you to ramp up the intensity, for longer, and without burning out—it's perfect for high-intensity cardio, functional strength, and challenging stability workouts.

• No sugar. No sweeteners, & No artificial flavors. Gluten, grain, wheat & dairy free. Vegan.

• *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Red-Violet Beetroot Extract ~ Beta Vulgaris (3.5g), Raw Red Spinach Extract ~ Amaranthus Dubius (1g).

Directions

Vitalfit suggests mixing 1 loosely packed tbsp in cold water 30 minutes before working out. Try adding a dash of fresh lemon juice for taste.

entry.title: Wildly Omega - A Hyperlocal, Non-Industrialized Fish Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vitalfit
Type: Supplement
Price: 35.00

A Hyperlocal, Non-Industrialized Fish Oil Made From Wild-Caught New England (Winter) Skate.

Wildy Omega is a novel, environmentally friendly fish oil made from locally caught skate fish; Wildly Omega isn't just better for the planet, it's better for you, delivering more Omega-3s & DHA than most other fish species used to make fish oil.

- A daily fish oil that's as good for you as it is for the environment and local New England fisheries.*

- 675 mg of purified, molecularly distilled Omega-3s per serving. Clean as can be without any heavy metals, PCBs & microbial bacterias.*

- Burp-free formula sans added colors, flavors or scents - nothin fishy.*

Fresh from the sea, a stones throw away, better for the planet.

Vitalfit usually sticks to plants, but when they heard about a pair of sustainable food entrepreneurs making waves with a new type of fish oil... and breathing new life into New England fisheries, they needed to find out more.

Everything they heard was true. Turns out winter skate is a popular menu item in New England restaurants, but only a small portion of the skate ever makes it to the kitchen. The team at MassOMEGA figured out a way to transform a part of fish usually thrown away (the liver), into a high-quality fish oil.

Even better, skate oil has higher levels of Omega-3s, DHA, essential and non-essential fatty acids than salmon, tuna, cod, and krill oil combined.* Between supporting local fisherman, eliminating waste, and delivering a great product they were hooked.

• 25 servings per bottle

• Gluten-Free, Non-GMO

• *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Purified, New England Winter Skate Liver Oil (Fish). Water, Gelatin, Glycerin, Rosemary Hips Extract, Green Tea Extract, Sunflower Oil, & Natural Tocopherols For Freshness.

Directions

Vitalfit suggests taking two softgels every morning with your breakfast or water.

entry.title: Adapted - Adaptogenic Repair For A Balanced Mind & Body
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vitalfit
Type: Herbal Supplement
Price: 30.00

Adapted is a plant-based, adaptogenic blend to manage the effects of mental burnout and promote a seamless mind-body connection. Lion's Mane, Lemon Balm, and Holy Basil work together to help balance cortisol levels and regulate adrenal activity, keeping your mind present and your head in the game.*

Adapted is made of three plant-based ingredients shown to help your body:

- Manage stress, strain, and burnout.*

- Replenish energy levels and kick sluggishness.*

- Boost mood, focus, and awareness.*

- Improve exercise efficiency.*

- Counter exercise plateaus.*

Mindful Movement, Higher Awareness & Headstrong Drive.

Begin with a bright, balanced mind. But when the stress of the day turns into the strain on the brain, imbalances start to leave their mark: more fatigue, less focus, and that foggy feeling you can’t seem to shake. This stabilizing, adaptogenic blend addresses mental strain and burnout at the source. Adapted helps replenish overworked adrenals, manage cortisol production, and protect the central nervous system. The result? More energy, greater awareness, and seamless mind-body connection.

• No sugar. No sweeteners, & No artificial flavors. Gluten, grain, wheat & dairy free. Vegan.

• *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Certified Organic Lion's Mane (1.5g), Certified Organic Holy Basil (1.5g), Certified Organic Lemon Balm (45mg)

Directions

Vitalfit suggests mixing 1-2 teaspoons (about 3 grams) with your water (hot or cold), tea, nut milk, or favorite smoothie.

entry.title: Source - Adaptogenic Plant-Based Energy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vitalfit
Type: Herbal Supplement
Price: 30.00

Adaptogenic Plant-Based Energy & Vitality For Greater Athletic Performance

VitalFit Source is an invigorating, functional mushroom-adaptogen blend to help your body produce its own jitter-free, crash-resistant energy and improve athletic endurance.*

- Helps your body restore & produce sustainable energy.*

- Boosts athletic endurance & exercise stamina.*

- Counters adrenal fatigue & exercise burnout.*

- Improves immune & cardiovascular function.*

Adaptogen Driven Energy, Stamina & Endurance

VitalFit Source balances the energizing effect of wild cultured cordyceps with the rejuvenating properties of high-altitude pine pollen to help generate stable, day to day energy and rep-defying resilience.

• No sugar. No sweeteners, & No artificial flavors. Gluten, grain, wheat & dairy free. Vegan.

• *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Certified Organic Wild-Cultured Cordyceps (1.5g), Additive Free High-Altitude Pine Pollen (1g)

Directions

Vitalfit suggests mixing 1-2 teaspoons (about 3 grams) with hot water, tea, coffee, nut milk, or favorite smoothie. For exercise endurance, drink 30-60 minutes before working out. For jitter-free energy, drink as needed throughout the day.
